name: 星系天文學
comment: 限大二、大三、大四學生修習-需先修過大一的天文學後，才適合修習本門課程。
restrict: ◎限大二大三大四修習◎必須先修過【ESU0178  天文學（含實習）】
description: To learn Extension of extragalactic topics from introductory levels. Understand current research interests / methodology / terminology Dark matter, dark energy, lensing, S-Z effect, GRB etc, Extragalactic astronomy in the 21st century
goals: To learn Extension of extragalactic topics from introductory levels. Understand current research interests / methodology / terminology Dark matter, dark energy, lensing, S-Z effect, GRB etc, Extragalactic astronomy in the 21st century
syllabus:
01 Overview of galaxy astronomy and related extragalactic issues  
02 Stellar populations and the milky way   
03 Observational properties of the milky way   
04 The milky way and galaxy formation   
05 External galaxies: morphology and dynamics   
06 Normal galaxies: spiral galaxies   
07 Normal galaxies: elliptical galaxies – giant and dwarf   
08 midterm exam  
10 Distant galaxies  & Telescopes and observing  strategies  
11 Galaxy evolution and merging, deep surveys  
12 Nuclei of galaxies: supermassive black holes   
13 QSO absorption systems and IGM   
14 Nearby galaxies, local group, galaxy clusters   
15 X-ray clusters and ICM physics   
16 final exam

grading.note: midterm/final exams, oral presentation, term essays, homework, class performance

prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【ESU0178  天文學（含實習）】
